                                            java.lang.String depParse)
        Add HTML markup highlighting the matching dependency. Iterate through the clauses, highlighting each bound clause.
        Returns:
        a String with HTML boldface of the bound clauses

      • makeCountIndex

        public static java.util.TreeSet<AVPair> makeCountIndex(java.sql.Connection conn,
                                                       java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> tokens)
        Compile a frequency list for all the given tokens. Note that since AVPair takes strings, the numerical counts must be padded with 0's to maintain their order. Use 10 digits so we can handle billions of terms.

      • fetchFromSortedIndex

        public static java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> fetchFromSortedIndex(java.sql.Connection conn,
                                                                       java.lang.String indexName,
                                                                       java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> tokens)
        Returns:
        a set of keys of the form filename#sentencenum#linenum for sentences that contain the given tokens in the given index. If a given token has 100 times the number of instances of the current token set ignore it, since doing the union of the indexes will be more expensive than just searching for the token in the result set.

      • fetchFromIndex

        public static java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> fetchFromIndex(java.sql.Connection conn,
                                                                 java.lang.String indexName,
                                                                 java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> tokens)
        Returns:
        a set of keys of the form filename#sentencenum#linenum for sentences that contain the given tokens in the given index

      • matchDepBind

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> matchDepBind(CNF smallcnf,
                                                                                java.lang.String onedep)
        Note that dependency patterns must be simple CNF - no disjuncts and only positive literals
        Parameters:
        smallcnf - the dependency pattern to search for.
        onedep - the dependency match candidate

      • matchDep

        public static boolean matchDep(CNF smallcnf,
                               java.lang.String onedep)
        Note that dependency patterns must be simple CNF - no disjuncts and only positive literals
        Parameters:
        smallcnf - the dependency pattern to search for.
        onedep - the dependency match candidate

      • matchDependencies

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> matchDependencies(java.lang.String dep,
                                                                       java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> dependencies)
        Note that dependency patterns must be simple CNF - no disjuncts and only positive literals returns the indices of all the dependency forms that don't unify with the search dependency form
        Parameters:
        dep - the dependency pattern to search for.
        dependencies - the dependency parses of sentences to check for a match
        Returns:
        a list of integer indexes to items that don't match the pattern

      • matchSentences

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> matchSentences(java.lang.String phrase,
                                                                    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> sentences)
        returns the indices of all the dependency forms that don't unify with the search dependency form
        Parameters:
        phrase - the word or phrase to search for.
        sentences - the sentences to check for a match
        Returns:
        a list of integer indexes to items that don't match

      • fetchIndexes

        public static java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> fetchIndexes(java.sql.Connection conn,
                                                               java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> sentTokens,
                                                               java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> depTokens)
        Returns:
        a set of keys of the form filename#sentencenum#linenum for sentences that contain the given tokens in the two indexes

      • depToTokens

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> depToTokens(java.lang.String dep)
        Convert the textual representation of a dependency parse to a list of tokens found in the dependency
        Returns:
        a list of string tokens
